name: HTMX-API-WP
author: Esteban Cuevas
description: An un-official WordPress plugin that adds an HTMX API to your WordPress site.

scripts.version-bump: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const currentVersion = pkg.version; console.log('Current version ' + currentVersion); const readline = require('readline').createInterface({ input: process.stdin, output: process.stdout }); readline.question('Enter new version (semver): ', (newVersion) => { pkg.version = newVersion; require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2)); const fs = require('fs'); const files = ['composer.json', 'README.txt', 'api-for-htmx.php', 'SECURITY.md']; const regex = new RegExp(currentVersion + '(?!\d)', 'gm'); for (const file of files) { let data = fs.readFileSync(file, 'utf8'); data = data.replace(regex, newVersion); fs.writeFileSync(file, data, 'utf8'); } readline.close(); console.log('Bumped from ' + currentVersion + ' to ' + newVersion); console.log('Version updated successfully!'); });"
scripts.update-htmx: cp -r node_modules/htmx.org/dist/htmx.min.js assets/js/libs/ && cp -r node_modules/htmx.org/dist/htmx.js assets/js/libs/
scripts.update-htmx-extensions: wget https://github.com/bigskysoftware/htmx-extensions/archive/refs/heads/main.zip -O htmx-extensions.zip && unzip ./htmx-extensions.zip && mkdir -p ./assets/js/libs/ && mv ./htmx-extensions-main/src ./assets/js/libs/htmx-extensions/ && rm -rf ./htmx-extensions.zip && rm -rf ./htmx-extensions-main
scripts.update-alpinejs: cp -r node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js assets/js/libs/alpinejs.min.js && cp -r node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.js assets/js/libs/alpinejs.js
scripts.update-all: npm run update-htmx && npm run update-hyperscript && npm run update-alpinejs
